data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kvifte, Gunnar Mikalsen, Wagner, Rüdiger (2017): Review of Neurosystasis Satchell, with two new species from Cuba and a discussion of cerci and surstyli in Psychodinae (Diptera: Psychodidae). Zootaxa 4306 (1): 81-90, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4306.1.4|7 occurrences
